resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106336</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106336</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206471</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Religion and the Founding of the American Republic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Religion und die Gründung der amerikanischen 
Republik</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Religion et la fondation de la République 
américaine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Religião e fundar da república americana</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Religione e fondare della Repubblica americana</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θρησκεία και η ίδρυση της αμερικανικής Δημοκρατίας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Religión y la fundación de la república 
americana</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">examines the role religion played in the founding of the American colonies, in the shaping of early American life and politics, and in forming the American Republic.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">überprüft die Rolle Religion, die in der 
Gründung der amerikanischen Kolonien, im Formen der frühen 
amerikanischen Lebensdauer und der Politik gespielt wird, und wenn, 
die amerikanische Republik bildend.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">examine la religion de rôle jouée dans la 
fondation des colonies américaines, dans la formation de la vie 
américaine et de la politique tôt, et en formant la République 
américaine.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">examina a religião do papel jogada em fundar das 
colônias americanas, em dar forma da vida americana e da política 
adiantadas, e em dar forma à república americana.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">esamina la religione di ruolo giocata nel fondare 
delle colonie americane, nella modellatura della vita americana e 
della politica iniziali e nel formare la Repubblica americana.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εξετάζει τη θρησκεία ρόλου που παίζεται στην ίδρυση 
των αμερικανικών αποικιών, στη διαμόρφωση της πρόωρων 
αμερικανικής ζωής και της πολιτικής, και με διαμόρφωση της 
αμερικανικής Δημοκρατίας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">examina la religión del papel jugada en la 
fundación de las colonias americanas, en formar de la vida americana 
y de la política tempranas, y en la formación de la república 
americana.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206471</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106336</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/religion-and-the-founding-of-the-american-republic</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
